articles.title: Bengaluru court issues non-bailable arrest warrant against former CM B S Yediyurappa in Pocso case - The Times of India
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: A Bengaluru court on Thursday issued a non-bailable arrest warrant against former Karnataka chief minister B S Yediyurappa in a Pocso case.

articles.author: Manya Jain
articles.title: Pencil Nebula: Nasa Hubble releases video of star that exploded thousands of years ago - The Times of India
articles.description: Nasa's Hubble Space Telescope has unveiled a video featuring the Pencil Nebula, identified as NGC 2736, an intriguing celestial entity within the Vela supernova remnant. (Photo: NasaHubble)
articles.content: Nasa's Hubble Space Telescope has unveiled a video featuring the Pencil Nebula, identified as NGC 2736, an intriguing celestial entity within the Vela supernova remnant. (Photo: NasaHubble)
